snippet: After 28 years and an estimated 2,100 screenings, the AMC Loews Harvard Square 5 in Cambridge, Mass., hosted its last showing of “The Rocky Horror Picture Show” on Saturday, according to The Boston Globe.
abstract: Movie theater AMC Loews Harvard Square in Cambridge, Mass, will close permanently, ending its 28-year run of cult film The Rocky Horror Picture Show.
lead_paragraph: After 28 years and an estimated 2,100 screenings, the AMC Loews Harvard Square 5 in Cambridge, Mass., hosted its last showing of “The Rocky Horror Picture Show” on Saturday, according to The Boston Globe.

headline.main: ‘Rocky Horror’ Film Ends a Run, for Now
headline.print_headline: ‘Rocky Horror’ Film Ends a Run, for Now
